description: '''Belle and Sebastian''' are a Scottish [[indie pop]] band formed in [[Glasgow]] in 1996. Led by [[Stuart Murdoch (musician)|Stuart Murdoch]], the band has released twelve studio albums. They are often compared with acts such as [[the Smiths]] and [[Nick Drake]]. The band took their name from the 1965 television series ''[[Belle and Sebastian (1965 TV series)|Belle and Sebastian]]''.
